diskUtilities

Class Find

  • java.lang.Object
    • diskUtilities.Find

  • public class Find
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the necessary methods to find every instance of the name in the disk
    Author:
    Israel J.Lopez Toledo

      Travels recursively through every non empty directory.

    • Method Detail

      • recFiles

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> recFiles(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> files,
                                                      DiskUnit d,
                                                      int currentDir,
                                                      java.lang.String name,
                                                      java.lang.String oldName,
                                                      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> names)
        Travels recursively through every non empty directory. First it verifies if content of directory is file or directory. If it is a directory it verifies it verifies if name matches target name, if it matches it adds the path name to list. Then it verifies if it is empty, if it is empty it simply, goes on to the next element if it is not empty the method calls itself. If it is a file it simply verifies it verifies if name matches target name, if it matches it adds the path name to list and goes on to next element (uses stacks to move through directory).
        Parameters:
        files - an array list with the content of the current directory the method is verifying
        d - an instance of the current disk
        currentDir - inode index of the previous directory
        name - target name method is looking for
        oldName - previous path name
        names - list of every instance of the name
        Returns:
        a list of every instance of the name it is looking for

      • createList

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> createList(int inodeIndex,
                                                        DiskUnit d)
        Creates an array list with every name that the directory provided contains
        Parameters:
        inodeIndex - inode index of the directory from which the list will be created
        d - an instance of the current disk
        Returns:
        array list with every content of the directory

      • findFile

        public int findFile(java.lang.String name,
                    DiskUnit d,
                    int current)
        Finds target directory or file inode index
        Parameters:
        name - name of the target to find
        d - an instance of the current disk
        current - inode index of current directory
        Returns:
        target directory or file inode index, return -1 if file is not found

      • isDirectory

        public boolean isDirectory(java.lang.String name,
                           DiskUnit d,
                           int current)
        Verifies if target is file or directory
        Parameters:
        name - name of the target to determine if it is directory or file
        d - an instance of the current disk
        current - inode index of current directory
        Returns:
        true if file is directory, false otherwise
